<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the group has now filled all of its slots, or if we&#39;re using a special</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// group-terminating nop, the group is complete.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: the same for P9 as previous gen until POWER9 scheduling is ready</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/directive">Directive</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#afabcc2ff4ea75ff845f97b0807e8de34aa2b626cb4809ee8a3b3da9d475eabe05">PPC::DIR&#95;PWR6</a> || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/directive">Directive</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#afabcc2ff4ea75ff845f97b0807e8de34a0c8a5dd168df904e8c29520a47502a61">PPC::DIR&#95;PWR7</a> ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/directive">Directive</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#afabcc2ff4ea75ff845f97b0807e8de34aa3de856d909c5b0166919bf6e4bd1a3d">PPC::DIR&#95;PWR8</a> || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/directive">Directive</a> == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#afabcc2ff4ea75ff845f97b0807e8de34a0a03bfd83c00f4d1edab975b7bfe7f36">PPC::DIR&#95;PWR9</a> ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurSlots == 6) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">    CurGroup.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">    CurSlots = CurBranches = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">    CurGroup.push&#95;back(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">    ++CurSlots;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PowerPC 970 Hazard Recognizer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This models the dispatch group formation of the PPC970 processor.  Dispatch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// groups are bundles of up to five instructions that can contain various mixes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of instructions.  The PPC970 can dispatch a peak of 4 non-branch and one</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branch instruction per-cycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There are a number of restrictions to dispatch group formation: some</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions can only be issued in the first slot of a dispatch group, &amp; some</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions fill an entire dispatch group.  Additionally, only branches can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// issue in the 5th (last) slot.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Finally, there are a number of &quot;structural&quot; hazards on the PPC970.  These</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// conditions cause large performance penalties due to misprediction, recovery,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and replay logic that has to happen.  These cases include setting a CTR and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// branching through it in the same dispatch group, and storing to an address,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then loading from the same address within a dispatch group.  To avoid these</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// conditions, we insert no-op instructions when appropriate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: This is missing some significant cases:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   1 Modeling of microcoded instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   2 Handling of serialized operations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   3 Handling of the esoteric cases in &quot;Resource-based Instruction Grouping&quot;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppchazardrecognizer970/#a64f6635ee2148d5abf526f462a0c0890"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ppchazardrecognizer970/#a64f6635ee2148d5abf526f462a0c0890">PPCHazardRecognizer970::PPCHazardRecognizer970</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag">ScheduleDAG</a> &amp;DAG)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">    : DAG(DAG) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">  EndDispatchGroup();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9a7b5c68c90f85baaedaa854cc5002cc">errs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;=== Start of dispatch group\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0, e = NumStores; i != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/numbers/#a92f4283d4e0e2ea1776894b3ae93640f">e</a>; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LoadValue == StoreValue&#91;i&#93; &amp;&amp; LoadOffset == StoreOffset&#91;i&#93;)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Okay, we don&#39;t have an exact match, if this is an indexed offset, see if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we have overlap (which happens during fp-&gt;int conversion for example).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StoreValue&#91;i&#93; == LoadValue) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Okay the base pointers match, so we have &#91;c1+r&#93; vs &#91;c2+r&#93;.  Check</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StoreOffset&#91;i&#93; &lt; LoadOffset) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
